targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("sent_udp_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.hermescontrollerinfo.LinkStats" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(last("sent_arp_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.hermescontrollerinfo.LinkStats" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("rcvd_udp_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.hermescontrollerinfo.LinkStats" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(last("rcvd_arp_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.hermescontrollerinfo.LinkStats" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("sent_ping_count"),1s) FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.hermescontrollerinfo.LinkStats" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("rcvd_ping_count"),1s) FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.hermescontrollerinfo.LinkStats" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("num_seq_id_errors"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("num_ts_errors"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)
SELECT min("min_seq_id_jump") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

panels.title: Min Sequence ID jump at DLH

targets.query: SELECT max("max_seq_id_jump") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

panels.title: Max Sequence ID jump at DLH

targets.query: SELECT max("max_seq_id_jump") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}\.${application}\..*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT min("min_seq_id_jump") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}\.${application}\..*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Min/Max Sequence ID jump at DLH for application ${application}

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("num_seq_id_errors"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(last("num_ts_errors"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}\.${application}\..*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter
list.label: Partition name
list.name: partition
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter

list.definition: SELECT "source_id" FROM ( SELECT "max_seq_id_jump", "source_id" FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter )
list.label: Readout Application
list.name: application
list.query: SELECT "source_id" FROM ( SELECT "max_seq_id_jump", "source_id" FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter )
